creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: dark maroon velvet; low V-cut neckline; long sleeves with pleat stitching at tops; machine stitched zigzags around neckline and cuffs and at waistline; very full skirt; horizontal pleat details on skirt near hem with one band of double embroidered zigzags in black
title: Dress (rob tanura)
